price: Hayatawafaa kitu mali yao wala watoto wao mbele ya Mwenyezi Mungu. Hao ndio watu wa Motoni. Humo watadumu milele.
arabic: لَّن تُغۡنِيَ عَنۡهُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـًٔاۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
footnotes: Mali yao na watoto wao hayatawalinda na adhabu ya Mwenyezi Mungu hata chembe. Hao ni watu wa Motoni, wa kudumu humo milele.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lan tugh'niya ʿanhum amwāluhum walā awlāduhum mina al-lahi shayan ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri hum fīhā khālidūna
